dmca.title: [Fwd: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3045451D] DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up woofersetc.com/Sony Mobil
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 16, 2007 8:21 AM
To: Legal Response
Cc: info@woofersetc.com
Subject: FW: [Fwd: FW: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3045451D] DMCA ISP 1st Follow-up
woofersetc.com/Sony Mobile]

The Planet,

I have rechecked www.woofersetc.com website and they are still in violation.  I
added all infringing URL's into the Cease and Desist Letter below.  Please contact
me if you need any further information.

Thank you,



1/29/2007 
info@woofersetc.com
VIA CERTIFIED US MAIL
RETURN RECEIPT REQUESTED

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
George Poletes
1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110
Dallas TX 75207

Re:  Unauthorized Use of Sony's Trademarks and/or Copyrighted Materials

Dear Designated Agent:

We have been retained by our client, Net Enforcers, Inc. to contact you with respect
to unauthorized use of Sony's trademarks and/or copyrighted materials.  

Sony has retained Net Enforcers to assist with the protection and enforcement of its
rights in Sony-owned or licensed trademarks, logos, and other copyrighted materials.
 Net Enforcers has in turn retained us to assist with this matter.  Pursuant to 17
U.S.C.
